div.p: HUGO Reutlingensis: Flores musicae.—( Strasbourg, Jean PrüssJean Grüningers.d.l, in-40. Hain 7173; Proctor 569; Voulliéme: Berlin2393. 347 HUGO Reutlingensis( Spechtshart): Flores musicae.— ( Strasbourg, Jean PrüssJean Grüninger1488), in-4°. Brunet II5, 1297, Hain 7174; Polain 2036; Proctor 538; Voulliéme: Berlin2351.— Jadis bibl. de Strasbourg, inc. n° 1863, 2325; B N Berlin, BN Paris. 348 HUGO Reutlingensis. Flores musicae.—( Strasbourg, Jean PrüssJean Grüninger1488), in-4°( En partie réimpression de Hain 7174). Proctor 538; Schmidt III, 21 janvier 1494: B N Paris; Schreiber 5270; Voulliéme: Berlin2352; Gilhofer et Ranschburg( Vienne) Catal. 261( 1936) n° 101: 750 fr. suisses. First and very rare edition of« one of the earliest books cont. Music entirely printed from metal forms and one of the earliest on musical theory at all. The author’ s name appears on leaf 4: Hugo sacerdos and this book was written by him in the year 1322».[ Identique avec n° 348(?)). 349 HUGo de Sancto Victore: Didascalion et varii tractatus.— ( Strasbourg] 1483, in- fol. Copinger 3193; Pellechet: Colmar804. 350 HYMNI: Uslegunge der hymbs(!) nach der zitt des gantzen iares und exponierungen vast nützliche von latin zu tütsch...—( Strasbourg, Jean PrüssJean Grüninger) 21 janvier 1494 , in-4°. Hain- Copinger 2145— Hain 16107; Proctor 2426; Brit. Mus. Cat. III, 710; Voullième: Berlin2287, 8. 351 IMITATIO Christi.—( Strasbourg, Martin Flach 1489), in-40. Hain 9099; Schmidt VI, p. 5, n° 24. 352 INNOCENTIUS III( pape): De miseria conditionis humanae. Avec: Tractatus seu Summa de creatione mundi... 56
